mapper.insert: INSERT INTO category (c_no, c_name, c_subname, c_seq, c_cnt, c_parent) SELECT CATEGORY_SEQ.nextval AS c_no, #{c_name} AS c_name, CASE WHEN EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM CATEGORY WHERE c_name = #{c_name}) THEN #{c_subname} ELSE '-' END AS c_subname, CASE WHEN EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM CATEGORY WHERE c_name = #{c_name}) THEN (SELECT MAX(c_seq) + 1 FROM CATEGORY WHERE c_name = #{c_name}) ELSE (SELECT COALESCE(CEIL(MAX(c_seq) / 10 + 0.5) * 10 + 1, 1) FROM CATEGORY) END AS c_seq, 100 AS c_cnt, CASE WHEN EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM CATEGORY WHERE c_name = #{c_name}) THEN (SELECT c_no FROM CATEGORY WHERE c_name = #{c_name} AND c_subname = '-') ELSE NULL END AS c_parent FROM dual
mapper.select: SELECT c_no, c_name, c_subname, c_seq, c_cnt, c_parent FROM category WHERE c_subname != '-' ORDER BY c_seq ASC
SELECT c_no, c_name FROM category WHERE c_name IN ( SELECT DISTINCT c_name FROM category ) AND c_subname = '-' ORDER BY c_seq ASC
SELECT c_no, c_name, c_subname FROM category WHERE c_name = #{c_name} AND c_subname != '-' ORDER BY c_seq ASC

SELECT c_no, c_name, c_subname, c_seq, c_cnt, c_parent FROM category
WHERE UPPER(c_name) LIKE '%' || UPPER(#{word}) || '%' OR UPPER(c_subname) LIKE '%' || UPPER(#{word}) || '%'
ORDER BY c_seq ASC

SELECT COUNT(*) as cnt FROM category
WHERE UPPER(c_name) LIKE '%' || UPPER(#{word}) || '%' OR UPPER(c_subname) LIKE '%' || UPPER(#{word}) || '%'
ORDER BY c_seq ASC
